description:
Stay warm and ready for any winter adventure with the Embroidered Bird Toque toque. Crafted from 100% recycled polyester knit with moisture-wicking fibers and fleece lining for ultimate warmth, comfort, and technical performance.

  • 100% recycled polyester knit with moisture-wicking fibers for technical performance
  • Fleece-lined headband for added warmth and softness, ideal for cold conditions
  • Snug fit designed to stay in place, even under goggles
name: Arc'teryx Embroidered Bird Toque - Unisex
